p: In December 2019, a novel coronavirus, the severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus-2 (SARS- CoV-2) which causes a human disease named coronavirus disease (COVID-19) was identified in the pneumonia outbreaks in Wuhan, China, in December 2019 ( Chan et al., 2020). It is currently expanding rapidly to several countries all-around the word, on February 21 the first person-to-person transmission in Italy was reported ( Spina et al., 2020). Here, we report a case of SARS-CoV-2 and Influenza A co-infection and a mini-review of the literature.
